name: Cut the Dot: Impossible Ballgame
description:
Here it is, classicly simple and addictive retro meltdown... can you cut it?

Cut the dot is a slice of retro rebound action, all set to test your arcade reaction and dodge skills through 50 furiously challenging levels.

The aim of the game is to keep all the coloured dots together by slicing away at each level shape, just don't collide with those dots!

Need help slicing?..I doubt it..but just in case why not grab yourself some cool little helpers, time warps, instant wipe outs and super bombs are all waiting for those retro nuts who just wanna rebound into the next level. Get your game up the levels and hit the top ranks in Game Centre.


Features:

- 50 Great levels of retro rebound
- Cool Helpers for ultimate Dot destruction
- Points Store
- Game Centre Leaderboards
